discern.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to notice or understand something by thinking about it carefully
discern.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Officials were keen to discern how much public support there was.
discern.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to be able to see something by looking carefully
discern.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: We could just discern a town in the distance.
discern.translation[0].note_box[0].items: Discern is not used in the progressive You say
I am discerning a slight difference
